sentences.en: After a quick courtship they married.
sentences.cn: 他们经过一番短暂的恋爱就结婚了.

sentences.en: After a three-weekend courtship, Pamela accepted Randolph's proposal of marriage.
sentences.cn: 经过3个周末的追求之后，帕梅拉接受了伦道夫的求婚。

sentences.en: After a three-weekend courtship, Pamela accepted Tom's proposal of marriage.
sentences.cn: 经过3个周末的追求之后，帕梅拉接受了汤姆的求婚。

sentences.en: After a whirlwind courtship, they married and went to live in Bath.
sentences.cn: 经过一场旋风式恋爱, 他们结了婚,到巴斯生活去了.

sentences.en: Because of the war they were obliged to conduct their courtship by post.
sentences.cn: 由于战争,他们只得通过写信谈恋爱.

sentences.en: Courtship is somewhat vocal with a lot of displaying by the male.
sentences.cn: 雄性动物在求偶时会尽量展示自己，并发出一些声响。

sentences.en: Courtship will include displays in which the male fluffs up his feathers.
sentences.cn: 鸟儿求偶的表现包括雄鸟抖松羽毛的炫耀行为.

sentences.en: From that time he was the most humble, modest, and importunate man alive in his courtship.
sentences.cn: 从那时候起他变做世上最自谦, 最有礼貌, 最屡求不倦的求婚人了.

sentences.en: He won her heart after a brief courtship.
sentences.cn: 经过短时期的追求,他便赢得了她的芳心.

sentences.en: His courtship swept her off her feet.
sentences.cn: 他的求爱立即赢得了她的心.

sentences.en: If she was a prudent girl, she had to find some way to encourage his courtship.
sentences.cn: 姑娘如果有点心计,就会用某种方式鼓励他的追求.

sentences.en: Our long courtship had been conducted mostly by letter.
sentences.cn: 我俩长期的恋爱过程基本上靠的是书信。

sentences.en: They married after a short courtship.
sentences.cn: 他们恋爱不久便结婚了。

sentences.en: They were more interested in courtship and cars than in school.
sentences.cn: 比起上学，他们对谈恋爱和汽车更感兴趣。

sentences.en: This high - pitched babble is presumably for courtship, although scientists are not certain.
sentences.cn: 据推测,这可能是雄性老鼠在求爱, 尽管科学家对这一点还不是很确定.

words.tran_cn: 招致（失败、危险等）；向…献殷勤；设法获得

trans.tran_cn: 求爱期，追求期，求爱，求婚，[动]求偶（现象）
trans.tran_en: the period of time during which a man and woman have a romantic relationship before marrying
